description: Master the tools necessary to harness the power of your ideas in Innovation & Design Thinking, the University of Cincinnati’s revolutionary MOOC2Degree course. Learn to employ a step-by-step process to generate new ideas and quickly transform them into a viable pipeline of tomorrow’s new, must-have products and services. Guest lectures from some of the foremost experts and Fortune 500 executives in innovation, design and new product development
title: Innovation and Design Thinking
